name: Cute Kitten Dress Up
description:
Dress up and take care of your own virtual kittens.
Design a new look for your lovable pets to share with your friends! it will surely be a game your kids love to play with.
With this game, your kids can create cute, stylish as well as funny looks for the kittens.
There are a variety of options available for the kittens such as hairstyles, tops, bottoms, shoes and a whole lot of accessories like bracelets, jewelry and decorations!
You can show off your creative side by mixing and matching clothes and accessories to create new looks all the time.
